function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of testing kits","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 due to undetected cases","Mitigation":"Investing in testing infrastructure, increasing production capacity for testing kits","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, automated testing systems","People":"Public, healthcare workers, at-risk populations","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, private sector"},{"Description":"Shortages of ventilators","Impact":"Inability to treat severe cases of COVID-19, leading to higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Increasing ventilator production, developing alternative ventilation solutions","Technologies":"High-flow nasal cannula, non-invasive ventilation devices","People":"Severely ill COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, medical device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Insufficient accessibility to personal protective equipment (PPE)","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare workers and the public contracting COVID-19","Mitigation":"Ramping up PPE production, implementing effective distribution channels","Technologies":"Antimicrobial PPE, reusable PPE, automated PPE production systems","People":"Healthcare workers, essential workers, the public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, private sector"}]}
